# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than just its price tag, it's an investment in enhancing your experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer of $125 for this item. I believe this price reflects its true value while offering you a special opportunity. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer
